content: Once the captain falls (and watch for another Puppet Spider nearby, you can check around the back of the house to the left to find another green Wisp guarded by a Puppet Spider hanging from the tree above.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
Once the captain falls (and watch for another Puppet Spider nearby, you can check around the back of the house to the left to find another green Wisp guarded by a Puppet Spider hanging from the tree above.
